content.p: Source and binary packages of NLog are available for download from CodePlex site. The following versions are currently available:

ul.li: NLog 1.0 Refresh - most recent stable release.

content.p: Each version has multiple packages available:

ul.li: NLog-VERSION-setup.exe - setup package which includes compiled binaries, help file and integration with Visual Studio. Source code is not included.
NLog-VERSION-setup-debug.exe - setup package which includes compiled binaries (including PDB files), help file and integration with Visual Studio.
NLog-VERSION-bin.zip - compiled binaries and help file
NLog-VERSION-bin-debug.zip - compiled binaries (including PDB files) and help file

content.p: You can also download NLog directly from the Subversion repository.
To view the repository contents in your web browser, click http://svn.nlog-project.org/viewvc/nlog.
To download latest sources, use an Subversion client (such as TortoiseSVN) and point it at:
Subversion is available to everybody in read-only mode.
